plays.text: Goal scored by Rick Nash assisted by David Vyborny and Scott Lachance
Penalty to Owen Nolan 2 minutes for Boarding Rostislav Klesla
Penalty to Jody Shelley 2 minutes for Roughing Brad Stuart
Penalty to Brad Stuart 10 minutes for Game Misconduct Jody Shelley
Penalty to Brad Stuart 5 minutes for Elbowing Jody Shelley served by Jonathan Cheechoo
Penalty to Kyle McLaren 5 minutes for Fighting Grant Marshall
Penalty to Grant Marshall 5 minutes for Fighting Kyle McLaren
Penalty to Jaroslav Spacek 2 minutes for Holding Teemu Selanne
Penalty to Jean-Luc Grand-Pierre 2 minutes for Hooking Jonathan Cheechoo
Penalty to Jody Shelley 2 minutes for Crosschecking Bryan Marchment
Penalty to Owen Nolan 2 minutes for High Sticking Geoff Sanderson
Penalty to Rick Nash 2 minutes for Diving Mike Fisher served by Marcus Ragnarsson
Penalty to Mike Ricci 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Scott Lachance
